tweet.text: Want to know more about the Carter administration’s communications with the former Shah of Iran following the 1979 capture of U.S. hostages at the U.S. Embassy in Tehran? Read the newly released #FRUS: https://t.co/fDVWjWAqPP https://t.co/DuqrnrCVxy
